column4: browsing with your file manager and the drag/droping to your player is what you want?
yeah, that or some way within the program to browse the filesystem, but it seems that audacious, which was my first choise cant to that with files from a samba share
ok, i get it now
and your server is linux as well?
i think so, it's some generic NAS
can you ssh to that thing?
nope :(
like http://www.linuxquestions.org/questions/linux-networking-3/mounting-a-samba-share-933322/
i got it mounted, but audacious doesnt support adding folders from samba shares, this only works with normal files
fstab
perhaps run yourplayer from cli and then drop that share and see if any errors pop out
would be worth a try
nope
but you can see this files normaly with some file manager? copy them localy and so on?
yes, all that works fine, it just seems that audacious doesnt support adding directorys from samba shares
perhaps try "deadbeef" as plazer, very similar.
is there a recent ppa for deadbeef?
iam using deb-multimedia.org
okay
deadbeef seems nice, but the gui is ugly ;)
does it work? evev if ugly
yeah
but i got a workaround with gvfs so that it works with audacious too
cool
